newsitem.title: POLAND: POLISH SHARES CLOSE LOWER IN CONTINUOUS TRADE.
newsitem.headline: POLISH SHARES CLOSE LOWER IN CONTINUOUS TRADE.

text.p: Eleven stocks fell, seven rose and eight were flat in 13.3-million-zloty Warsaw bourse continuous trade on Monday with the WIG 20 index down 1.3 percent to 1,687.2 points.
The remaining four stocks did not trade.
The National Investment Fund NIF index fell 1.1 percent to 138.3 points in 1.1-million-zloty trade.
NFI units were flat at 137.5 zlotys in a 9.6-million-zloty turnover.
